message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation with a price of $180. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.

I understand that $180 might be a bit high for you, but I still think the product is worth a premium. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $150. This is a great compromise, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above $120. I'd be willing to meet you at $130. That's the lowest I can go.

I understand that $130 is still a bit above your target, but I'm willing to make another compromise. I'll offer you the product for $140. This is the lowest I can go, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $140 is still a bit high for me. I'd be willing to meet you at $125. That's the lowest I can go.

I understand that $125 is still a bit above your target, but I'm willing to make another compromise. I'll offer you the product for $135. This is the lowest I can go, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $135 is still a bit high for me. I'd be willing to meet you at $128. That's the lowest I can go.

I understand that $128 is still a bit above your target, but I'm willing to make another compromise. I'll offer you the product for $132. This is the lowest I can go, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $132 is still a bit high for me. I'd be willing to meet you at $127. That's the lowest I can go.
